message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  It's in excellent condition and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your offer.  However, $8,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,000, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to go up to $8,500 for the product. This is the highest amount I can afford at this time.
